title: Countries with the lowest national debt 2019
yAxis: National debt in relation to GDP
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and National debt in relation to GDP in the y axis.
Country Kiribati has the highest National debt in relation to GDP and Hong Kong SAR has the lowest National debt in relation to GDP.
The highest Country Kiribati has 22.62 more National debt in relation to GDP than the lowest Country Hong Kong SAR.
